title: IZ (band)
text:
IZ (Korean: 아이즈; pronounced "eyes") is a South Korean band formed by Music K Entertainment in 2017. They debuted on August 31, 2017, with All You Want.


== Members ==
Hyunjun (현준) – guitar, leader
Jihoo (지후) – vocals
Woosu (우수) – drums
Junyoung (준영) – bass
